title: Thomas Rhett & His Wife Are Expecting Two Babiesâ€¦ But They Aren't Twins!
text:
But unlike BeyoncÃ© and Jay Z , and George and Amal Clooney â€” the babies AREN'T twins! 
That's because the country crooner and his longtime love are not only pregnant with their first child, but they're also in the process of adopting a child from Africa! Exciting times!!! 
Related: Thomas & Lauren Are The Cutest Couple On The Red Carpet (Again) 
The Die A Happy Man singer took to Instagram with the precious news (below): 
We are so happy to announce that we are pregnant and we are in the process of adopting a child from Africa! Safe to say life is about to get crazy! ğŸ˜œ A post shared by ThomasRhettAkins (@thomasrhettakins) on Feb 15, 2017 at 8:20am PST
